LogDatabaseSettings.SqlScriptString: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'LogUpdatePrice') BEGIN CREATE TABLE LogUpdatePrice (Id BIGINT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY IDENTITY(1,1), Message NVARCHAR(MAX) NULL, Level NVARCHAR(50) NULL,TraceCode NVARCHAR(50) NULL,TimeStamp DATETIME NULL, Exception NVARCHAR(MAX) NULL, RequestId NVARCHAR(100) NULL, ActionName NVARCHAR(100) NULL, SourceName NVARCHAR(100) NULL, Metadata NVARCHAR(MAX) NULL, InsuranceType NVARCHAR(50) NULL, NationalCode NVARCHAR(50) NULL, Logger NVARCHAR(100) NULL); END
